scripts.build:ui: rm -rf build && cd ~/Documentos/Customers/CLIENTE_DUGALMAN/fullstackopen.com/fullstack/part2/doc  && npm run build --prod && cp -r build  ~/Documentos/Customers/CLIENTE_DUGALMAN/fullstackopen.com/fullstackopen-react-course-2021-part-03
